hits.title: Obby: Mini-Games
hits.description:
Obby: Mini-Games - play against other players and win Cups! Triumph in each mode and stand on the golden winner's pedestal!

üî¥ MODES üî¥

üöÄ PARKOUR üöÄ
Complete colorful levels on the parkour map and reach the end!

üéØ COLORFUL FLOOR üéØ
In this mode, you need to step on tiles whose color is displayed at the top of the screen.

üéØ GLASS BRIDGE üéØ
And in this mode, you need to choose which glass tile to jump on, but one will break, and the other will remain intact.

üéØ FALLING TILES üéØ
In this mode, you have to run across tiles, but there's a condition: the tiles you've already run on will fall down and disappear after a second. So, be careful.

‚òÄÔ∏è RAIN OF BLOCKS ‚òÄÔ∏è
This mode will unlock as you progress through the game!
hits.howToPlayText:
üñ•Ô∏è Desktop:

WASD ‚Äî Movement
Spacebar ‚Äî Jump
Tab ‚Äî Mouse Cursor

üì± Smartphone:

Movement ‚Äî Joystick on the left side of the screen
Jump ‚Äî Button on the bottom right of the screen
Camera Rotation ‚Äî Finger movements on the right side of the screen

hits.title: Obby: +1 Jump per Click
hits.description:
"Obby: +1 Jump per Click" ‚Äì a unique clicker-obby where every click gives you power for incredible jumps!  

üîπ Key Features:  
‚úÖ Jump Clicker ‚Äì charge your jump power with clicks and overcome giant chasms! 
‚úÖ Parkour Challenges ‚Äì complex tracks with moving platforms, traps, and puzzles! 
‚úÖ Character Upgrades ‚Äì improve jump strength, height, and flight speed! 
‚úÖ Pets ‚Äì helpers increase jump power and grant special abilities! 
‚úÖ Rebirth System ‚Äì rebirth to multiply your jumping power!  

üåç Dynamic gameplay in the style of blocky sandbox games ‚Äì click, jump, and conquer the heights!  

üî• Can you reach the maximum height? Click, fly, and become the king of this obby!
hits.howToPlayText:
Computers:  
- WASD - control the character.  
- Space - jump.   

Mobile devices:  
- Joystick - control the character.  
- Button in the lower right corner - jump.  
- To rotate the camera, swipe the screen.

hits.title: Your Obby Parkour
hits.description:
Enter a thrilling world of non-stop challenges! Run, jump, dodge, and conquer in the ultimate parkour platformer! 
Survive crazy levels ‚Äî from burning lava and icy slides to water traps and mysterious portals. Watch out for trampolines, spinning traps, and tons of hidden paths!

Play with friends and travel through fun regions ‚Äî from simple to brutally hard! Discover the hidden little dragon, collect trophies, and unlock secret shortcuts and bonus zones!

Be careful of:
Deadly skeletons
Lava-filled volcanoes
Slippery ice paths
Horror mazes where it's easy to get lost!

Ready to be a true parkour master? Find the fastest paths, conquer extreme stages, and show the world your skills!

Perfect for fans of obby-style maps, parkour games, secrets, adventures, and multiplayer fun!
hits.howToPlayText:
The goal: get to the end.

Control:
WASD - movement.
Space bar - jump.
TAB - pause.
Shift - cursor.
Mouse wheel - zoom in/out.

On the phone:
Use the game interface.

hits.title: Speed per Click: Obby
hits.description:
"Speed per Click: Obby" ‚Äì An exciting clicker-speed simulator in the style of obby and blocky games!  

üîπ Key Features:  

‚úÖ Dynamic clicker ‚Äì Earn speed with every click and accelerate to incredible levels! 
‚úÖ Obby-style challenges ‚Äì Overcome parkour tracks with jumps and tricky maneuvers, just like in obby games! 
‚úÖ Progress & rewards ‚Äì Collect wins, unlock new locations, and upgrade your skills! 
‚úÖ Pets ‚Äì Buy pets to increase speed per click and beat levels faster! 
‚úÖ Rebirth system ‚Äì Perform rebirths to gain bonuses and speed up again!  

üåç Play in the best traditions of obby and blocky parkour ‚Äì It has everything: clicker mechanics, parkour, adrenaline, and fun!  

üî• Ready for the challenge? Click, jump, and become the champion of Speed per Click: Obby!

Computers: 
- WASD - control the character. 
- Space - jump.  

Mobile devices: 
- Joystick - control the character. 
- Button in the lower right corner - jump. 
- To rotate the camera, swipe the screen.

hits.title: Your Obby Size
hits.description:
Parkour and size control with secrets and surprises! Jump, run, and reach new heights in this thrilling game! Avoid lava and conquer challenges from easy to extreme!
Collect enough trophies to unlock secret paths, access new locations, and get unique character skins!
Beware of monsters guarding certain areas!
Find shortcuts to the top! Show everyone you're a true parkour master!

hits.title: Obby: Click and Grow
hits.description:
"Obby: Click and Grow" - an exciting 3D clicker game!  

üåü Main Gameplay: 
Upgrade your character's size through clicks 
Overcome challenging parkour trials 
Unlock achievements and earn valuable rewards  

ü¶Ñ Boost Your Progress: 
Collection of Obby pets - increase size with every click! 
Rebirth system - double your trophies and accelerate growth! 
Explore new blocky locations with unique challenges 

üèÜ Compete with Friends:  
Claim top positions on the leaderboard 
Daily free gifts and bonuses  

üöÄ Game Features: 
Bright blocky graphics 
Dynamic parkour with platformer elements 
Regular content updates and events 
Join the world of Obby - where every click brings you closer to greatness! Become the biggest and strongest character in the universe!
hits.howToPlayText:
Computers:

- Space - jump.  

Mobile Devices:

hits.title: Rooftop Run
hits.description:
Rooftop Run ‚Äì Race Across the City! üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüí®

Run, jump, and slide over rooftops in this fast-paced parkour game! Dodge obstacles, smash through barriers, and escape from enemies as you race through exciting levels.
hits.howToPlayText:
üî• Game Features:

Cool Parkour Moves ‚Äì Jump, roll, and slide to keep running.

Fast Levels ‚Äì Complete thrilling challenges and master your skills.

Simple Controls ‚Äì Easy to learn, fun to play!

üñ•Ô∏è Desktop Controls:

‚Üë (Up Arrow) ‚Äì Move up

‚Üì (Down Arrow) ‚Äì Move down

‚Üê (Left Arrow) ‚Äì Move left

‚Üí (Right Arrow) ‚Äì Move right

Spacebar ‚Äì Fire weapon

Shift ‚Äì Activate boost

üì± Mobile Controls:

On-Screen Joystick ‚Äì Drag to move

Fire Button ‚Äì Tap to shoot

Boost Button ‚Äì Tap to go faster

Be the best parkour runner! Play Rooftop Run now and start your adventure!

hits.title: Survive the Disasters: Obby
hits.description:
"Survive the Disasters: Obby" ‚Äì A hardcore obby survival simulator set in epic catastrophic events!  

You will face deadly maps where natural disasters constantly try to destroy you: floods, tsunamis, acid rain, meteor showers, thick fog, scorching lava, and tornadoes! Your goal is to survive at all costs!  

üå™Ô∏è Key Features: 
‚úÖ Dynamic Disasters: Each round brings a new combination of natural disasters! 
‚úÖ Parkour Mechanics: Use skills from classic obby games ‚Äì jump, dodge, and run! 
‚úÖ Bonuses & Boosters: Use starting power-ups to gain an advantage! 
‚úÖ Pets & Progression: Tame helpers, perform rebirths, and increase your power!

üèÜ What Awaits You:  
Dozens of maps with unique disasters;  
Various survival strategies ‚Äì outsmart the elements!;  

Can you survive all disasters and become a legend of this obby?
hits.howToPlayText:
Controls  

Computers: 
- WASD - control the character. 
- Space - jump.  

Mobile devices: 
- Joystick - control the character. 
- Button in the lower right corner - jump. 
- To rotate the camera, swipe the screen.

hits.title: Barry Prison: Parkour Escape!
hits.description: Join the exhilarating adventure of Barry Prison: Parkour Escape! Navigate complex parkour obstacles, outsmart Warden Barry, and gather items like coins and jetpacks to execute your escape. Play for free on your phone or computer and prove your skills in this ultimate test of freedom!
hits.howToPlayText:
Controls:

üíªComputer:

WASD - movement
Space - jump
Enter - use items
Shift - jetpack

hits.title: Poison Candy: Obby 1 Or 2-Player
hits.description:
"Poison Candy: Obby 1 Or 2-Player" ‚Äì an exciting obby game where you have to outsmart your friend! Can you make your opponent eat the poisonous candy that you chose?  

üé≠ Game Features:  
‚úÖ Detective obby ‚Äì become a real detective in the world of obby and parkour games! 
‚úÖ Two game modes ‚Äì play with a friend on one device or compete with a random opponent! 
‚úÖ Strategy and bluffing ‚Äì skip turns to confuse your opponent and lead them to the poisoned candy! 
‚úÖ Bright graphics ‚Äì colorful world in the style of your favorite obby games!  

üç≠ How to play?  
Choose a poisonous candy 
Use clever maneuvers to make your opponent eat it 
Become the king of the party! 
Try the sweetest and most dangerous obby adventure! 
Can you outplay your friend and survive?

Computer:

- Space - jump  

Mobile Devices:

hits.title: Space Rolling Balls Race
hits.description:
Game Title: üåå Space Rolling Balls Race üå†
Product Description:
Get ready for an exciting 3D adventure in Space Rolling Balls Race, a fun, addictive, and fast-paced rolling ball game set in outer space! üåç‚ú®
Control your rolling ball through thrilling cosmic tracks filled with obstacles, traps, jumps, and moving platforms. With simple fingertip controls, smooth physics-based gameplay, and catchy background music, every level will test your reflexes, timing, and focus!
üöÄ Features:


üéØ Easy to play, hard to master rolling ball gameplay


üå† Challenging 3D levels with cool space environments


‚ö° Smooth controls and realistic physics


üéµ Addictive sound effects and rhythm-based fun


ü™ê Suitable for all ages ‚Äî perfect casual game for everyone


üí´ If you love ball games, rolling games, parkour challenges, or reflex-based runners, Space Rolling Balls Race is the ultimate game for you!
Roll, dodge, and race your way through space to become the ultimate ball racing master! üèÜ
hits.howToPlayText:
How to Play üéÆ

‚ú® Follow these simple steps to master Space Rolling Balls Race:

üîπ Swipe or drag your finger on the screen to move the ball.
üîπ Avoid traps and obstacles that appear on the track.
üîπ Stay on the path ‚Äî falling off means game over!
üîπ Collect power-ups to boost your score and progress faster.
üîπ Keep up with the rhythm ‚Äî the music helps guide your timing.
üîπ Challenge yourself to beat your best distance and reaction speed!

hits.title: Easy Obby Parkour
hits.description:
Parkour-based game.
The nickname of the best player is shown to everyone at the start - beat the game and your nickname will be displayed too.
Change skins to easily tell players apart.
And check where each portal leads ;)

Colorful skins and different character models.

Pets (cats, sheep, dragons... they count as pets, right?)

If the game feels too hard, activate a boost like double jump or others to pass difficult sections.

Checkpoints are not saved - each run must start from the beginning so speed times are fair for all players.
hits.howToPlayText:
The goal: to collect the last trophy.
Control:
WASD - movement.
Space bar - jump.
TAB - pause.
Shift - cursor.
Mouse wheel - zoom in/out.

hits.title: Ultimate Obby Parkour Adventure Online
hits.description: Join the thrilling adventure of Ultimate Obby Parkour, a colorful world filled with obstacles and unique challenges across four different realms. Enjoy engaging gameplay and vibrant graphics on both your phone and computer, as you customize your character and strive to become a parkour master.
hits.howToPlayText:
The goal of the game: complete the game for a while. To change your nickname, click on it and then enter your nickname in the field

Controls:
WASD - move.
Space - jump.
TAB - pause.
Shift - show cursor
T - emotion panel
Y - dance panel
Mouse wheel forward/backward - zoom in/zoom out the camera.
Hold RMB to rotate the camera (with the cursor visible).

On the phone:
Use the game interface.

hits.title: Secret Parkour
hits.description:
Tower of Hell Parkour with Secrets and Surprises! Jump, run, and reach new heights in this thrilling game! Avoid the lava and conquer all the "regions" - from easy to extremely challenging levels!

Hidden Waterfall: Discover secret platforms and jump into the waterfall to find a hidden room filled with coins and trophies! Collect enough trophies to unlock the secret wall and gain access to a new portal and a unique character skin!

Parkour through City Skyscrapers: Face increasingly difficult challenges, dodge rotating obstacles, and show off your agility!

Use hidden shortcuts to reach the top faster! Show everyone you‚Äôre a true parkour master!
hits.howToPlayText:
The goal: get to the end.

Control:
WASD - movement.
Space bar - jump.
TAB - pause.
F - dash.
Shift - cursor.
Mouse wheel - zoom in/out.

On the phone:
Use the game interface.

hits.title: Parkour Runner 3D
hits.description:
Parkour Runner 3D is a fast-paced action running game where you sprint, jump, slide, and flip through thrilling obstacle courses! Test your reflexes as you race across rooftops, leap between platforms, dodge traps, and perform epic parkour tricks.
With smooth controls, lively environments, and challenging levels, every run keeps you on the edge of your seat.

Master your timing, collect boosts, unlock new characters, and become the ultimate parkour champion!
hits.howToPlayText:
WASD Controls

W ‚Äì Jump
A ‚Äì Move Left
S ‚Äì Slide
D ‚Äì Move Right

Arrow Key Controls

Up Arrow ‚Äì Jump
Left Arrow ‚Äì Move Left
Down Arrow ‚Äì Slide
Right Arrow ‚Äì Move Right

Special Abilities

Space (Single Tap) ‚Äì Head Booster
Space (Double Tap) ‚Äì Activate Hover Board

hits.title: Blockadventure io
hits.description:
üåç Welcome to BlockAdventure!

Dive into the thrilling world of BlockAdventure, a Minecraft-inspired online multiplayer experience packed with parkour challenges, obby adventures, and endless fun! Explore blocky worlds, compete with other players, and push your skills to the limit. Whether you‚Äôre jumping across floating platforms or racing through tricky maps, there‚Äôs always something exciting to do.

Customize your style in the Skin Menu ‚Äî choose your favorite look and stand out from the crowd as you conquer each obstacle!

And the best part? This is just the beginning.
New game modes and adventures are already on the way!

üöÄ Coming Soon Features
	‚Ä¢	üéÆ Mini-Games Hub ‚Äì Unlock and play various mini-games with friends
	‚Ä¢	üß© Puzzle-Based Maps ‚Äì Solve environmental puzzles to progress
	‚Ä¢	üë• Custom Avatars & Skins ‚Äì Personalize your character even more
	‚Ä¢	üèÜ Leaderboard System ‚Äì Climb the global ranks and show off your skills
	‚Ä¢	üõ†Ô∏è Level Editor ‚Äì Build and share your own parkour or obby maps
	‚Ä¢	üåé New Game Worlds ‚Äì Unique themes and environments to explore

‚∏ª

üïπÔ∏è Controls

Desktop Controls:
	‚Ä¢	W / A / S / D or Arrow Keys: Move
	‚Ä¢	Spacebar: Jump
	‚Ä¢	C: Change camera view
	‚Ä¢	F: Step back (return to checkpoint or previous step)

Mobile Controls:
	‚Ä¢	On-Screen Joystick: Move freely
	‚Ä¢	Jump Button: Tap to jump
	‚Ä¢	Camera Button: Toggle camera view
	‚Ä¢	Back Button: Go back to previous checkpoint

hits.title: Steve parkour in mine
hits.description:
Jump, run, and don‚Äôt fall! Help Steve navigate dangerous levels filled with traps, chasms, and true cubic madness.

The levels keep getting harder, and your reaction speed and jumping precision are your only hope.

This game is perfect for both beginners and those who consider themselves masters of parkour in virtual worlds.

Are you ready to show what Steve is capable of in the world of parkour?
hits.howToPlayText: Use the WASD keys to control the character. Press the spacebar to jump. Use the mouse to control the camera.
